verbs.description: [ARG1: First Lady Melania Trump] [V: was] [ARG2: in New York] [ARGM-PRP: for a series of meetings] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a spokesperson] , [ARGM-ADV: though it is unclear who the meetings were with or what they were about] .
